aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: The Facebook page 'Can Giuoc School Media' is the official media platform of Can Giuoc High School, Long An, Vietnam. This page was created to connect the school with students, parents, and the community through creative and modern media activities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description:
Quickly update information about events, academic and extracurricular activities, and student achievements.
Create a media playground for students to develop skills in photography, content writing, and social media management.
Build a dynamic, creative, and friendly image of the school in the eyes of the community.

story.title: Message
story.paragraph1: We believe that school media is not only a tool for connection but also an experiential educational environment, helping students develop comprehensively in both skills and creative thinking.
story.paragraph2: Follow our page to accompany and spread positive values from Can Giuoc High School!
